Bucket List API
============

Bucket List is a simple tool for getting a random bucket list item. It returns a random item from a predefined list of items.

![Build Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/build-passing-green)
![Code Climate](https://img.shields.io/badge/maintainability-B-purple)
![Prod Ready](https://img.shields.io/badge/production-ready-blue)

This is a Python API Wrapper for the [Bucket List API](https://apiverve.com/marketplace/api/bucketlist)

---

## Installation
	pip install apiverve-bucketlist

---

## Configuration

Before using the bucketlist API client, you have to setup your account and obtain your API Key.  
You can get it by signing up at [https://apiverve.com](https://apiverve.com)

---

## Usage

The Bucket List API documentation is found here: [https://docs.apiverve.com/api/bucketlist](https://docs.apiverve.com/api/bucketlist).  
You can find parameters, example responses, and status codes documented here.

### Setup

```
# Import the client module
from apiverve_bucketlist.apiClient import BucketlistAPIClient

# Initialize the client with your APIVerve API key
api = BucketlistAPIClient("[YOUR_API_KEY]")
```

---


### Perform Request
Using the API client, you can perform requests to the API.

###### Define Query

```
This API does not require a Query
```

###### Simple Request

```
# Make a request to the API
result = api.execute()

# Print the result
print(result)
```

###### Example Response

```
{
  "status": "ok",
  "error": null,
  "data": {
    "bucketListItem": "Learn to animate"
  },
  "code": 200
}
```
